description: Rich, silky and filled with herbs and spices, you'll want to make this moreish roasted-eggplant and tomato pasta again and again.
keywords: Pasta,Eggplant,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Budget,Halal,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,Peanut free
name: Roasted Eggplant & Tomato Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large eggplants, quartered lengthways, cut into 2cm pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 230°C/210°C fan-forced. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper. Arrange eggplant, in a single layer, on trays. Drizzle over oil and season with pepper. Bake for 30 minutes or until golden and tender. Set aside to cool slightly.
Meanwhile, cook pasta according to packet instructions in a large saucepan. Drain, reserving 1/4 cup cooking liquid. Return pasta and cooking liquid to pan.
Add passata, dried herbs, eggplant and half each of the parmesan and basil to pasta mixture, then heat over medium heat for 2 minutes, stirring, or until heated through.
Serve pasta topped with remaining parmesan and basil.
